CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels of the copolymers are lower than those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously , [21][22][23][24][25][26] and their low - lying HOMO energy levels are expected to afford high V OC s of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. copolymers
2. heteroarene - based DPP copolymers (specific types of copolymers)
3. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy levels (energy levels of a specific material property)
4. polymer solar cells (type of material used in the solar cells)
5. VOC (Voltage Output of the Cell)
6. polymer (implied material in the context of the paragraph)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. copolymers
2. heteroarene - based DPP copolymers
3. polymer (implied)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| heteroarene - based DPP copolymers |
| polymer (implied) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels of the copolymers are lower than those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously , [21][22][23][24][25][26] and their low - lying HOMO energy levels are expected to afford high V OC s of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. The energy levels of the copolymers: These are the levels of energy associated with the electrons in the copolymers.
2. Those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously: These are the energy levels of heteroarene-based DPP copolymers that have been reported in previous studies.
3. The low - lying HOMO energy levels: These are the energy levels of the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (HOMO) of the copolymers, which are expected to be at a lower energy level compared to other heteroarene-based DPP copolymers.
4. High V OCs: These are the high Voltage Open Circuit potentials of the polymer solar cells, which are expected to be achieved due to the low-lying HOMO energy levels of the copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. The energy levels of the copolymers: These refer to the material properties of the copolymers in terms of their energy levels.
2. The low-lying HOMO energy levels: This is a material property of the copolymers, specifically the energy level of their HOMO.
3. High V OCs: This is a material property of the polymer solar cells, specifically their high Voltage Open Circuit potentials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                          |
|--------------------------------------|
| The energy levels of the copolymers    |
| The low-lying HOMO energy levels      |
| High V OCs of the polymer solar cells |
